name: TalkValley
description: Talk with Hard-to-Reach People Over Phon
overview:
Purpose: Please consider mentoring University students over phone.

Process of helping students: You will be put in a conference call with a student only when you want to. No unwanted calls. No number sharing.

Benefits for You: No matter how you feel before, you will feel great after mentoring. Mentoring students is very fulfilling and satisfying experience. Students will be very grateful to you for sharing your wisdom and personal experiences.

About this initiative: Funded by salary and personal credit-cards of a University Professor. We are still in development phase, so call-placement will not happen. But feel free to create your profile.

Thanks: Rohit Aggarwal
